title: Ночные огни. Цюрих
author: Kukharskiy Igor
description:
Igor Kukharskiy is a master of impressionism. This artpiece is done with oil on canvas. 'Night Lights' is related to impressionism being a representative of city landscapes genre. 

This artwork took part in several art festivals and exhibitions approved by corresponding certificates.

Pay attention: Upon buying the digitalized copy of this masterpiece in Ultra HD 1:1 resolution, you will receive the original physical Authentic Painting.
